summary: REQ-3 appears implemented by updating the shared team member data source (frontend/src/config/team.ts) to display "Yash Gorivale" and removing "Amit Patel" from that data. However, additional non-requested meta/project tracking files were also modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project tracking/state file (project_state.json), including adding/updating feature request entries and known issues.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked for a static UI content update in frontend/src/config/team.ts and did not request updates to project metadata/state files.
BuildRequest did not request any documentation or file summary updates; only the team member name change in the shared team data source was required.
